prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Strings, Guitar, Drums, Piano, Synth Pad, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Strings, Guitar, Drums, Piano, and a Synth Pad, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Strings, Guitar, Drums, Piano, and a Synth Pad, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
No Bass is included in this song, but it does have Strings, Guitar, Drums, Piano, and a Synth Pad.
